results.title: A Current Affair
results.brief_description: A Current Affair is an Australian current affairs program airing weeknights on the Nine Network. The program is currently presented by Tracy Grimshaw.

constellations_other.name: Nightly news and laughs
constellations_other.description: Throughout the decades on Australian screens, comedy and news have often gone hand-in-hand.

results.description: A Current Affair is an Australian current affairs program airing weeknights on the Nine Network. The program is currently presented by Tracy Grimshaw.

results.title: A Cry in the Dark
results.headline_credit: Australia and United States of America, 1988
results.brief_description: Based on the true story of Lindy Chamberlain: During a camping trip to Ayers Rock in outback Australia, she claims she witnessed a dingo taking her baby daughter, Azaria, from the family tent. Azaria’s body is never found. After investigations and two public inquests, she is charged with murder. The case attracts a lot of attention, turning it into a media sideshow.

constellations_other.name: Dial M for Media
constellations_other.description: Explores the nature of media use in high-profile cases as well as the ability of media to sway public minds.

results.description: Based on the true story of Lindy Chamberlain: During a camping trip to Ayers Rock in outback Australia, she claims she witnessed a dingo taking her baby daughter, Azaria, from the family tent. Azaria’s body is never found. After investigations and two public inquests, she is charged with murder. The case attracts a lot of attention, turning it into a media sideshow.

results.title: A Country Practice
results.brief_description: A Country Practice was a beloved Australian television drama series that was one of the longest-running dramas of its kind at the time.

constellations_other.name: Black Power through film and TV
constellations_other.description: The Black Power movement of the late 1960s and early 70s was “the most exciting and dynamic era in modern Indigenous history” according to Aboriginal activist Professor Gary Foley, who gained widespread attention for protests during the time and later leveraged film and TV to fight for Indigenous rights.

constellations_other.name: Jill Bilcock
constellations_other.description: An editor’s work often goes unnoticed, but they’re scene-stitching not only brings the director’s vision to life but sometimes steals the show. One of Australia’s greatest editors, Jill Bilcock, has shaped some of the country’s most memorable screen stories.

results.description: A Country Practice was an Australian television drama series. At its inception, one of the longest-running of its kind, produced by James Davern of JNP Productions, who had wrote the pilot episode and entered a script contest for the network in 1979, coming third and winning a merit award. It ran on the Seven Network for 1,058 episodes from 18 November 1981 to 22 November 1993. It was produced in ATN-7’s production facility at Epping, Sydney. After its lengthy run on the seven network it was picked up by network ten with a mainly new cast from April to November 1994 for 30 episodes, although the ten series was not as successful as its predecessor . The Channel Seven series was also filmed on location in Pitt Town, while, the Channel Ten series was filmed on location in Emerald, Victoria.
description_for_label: A Country Practice was an Australian television drama series. At its inception, one of the longest-running of its kind, produced by James Davern of JNP Productions, who had wrote the pilot episode and entered a script contest for the network in 1979, coming third and winning a merit award. It ran on the Seven Network for 1,058 episodes from 18 November 1981 to 22 November 1993. It was produced in ATN-7’s production facility at Epping, Sydney. After its lengthy run on the seven network it was picked up by network ten with a mainly new cast from April to November 1994 for 30 episodes, although the ten series was not as successful as its predecessor . The Channel Seven series was also filmed on location in Pitt Town, while, the Channel Ten series was filmed on location in Emerald, Victoria.

results.title: A Cock and Bull Story
results.brief_description: Steve Coogan, an arrogant actor with low self-esteem and a complicated love life, is playing the eponymous role in an adaptation of “The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman” being filmed at a stately home. He constantly spars with actor Rob Brydon, who is playing Uncle Toby and believes his role to be of equal importance to Coogan’s.

constellations_other.name: Making films in black and white
constellations_other.description: Oscar-winner Sandy Powell crafted Abigail's (Emma Stone) costume in The Favourite to represent her ascension in the royal household of Queen Anne by utilising black and white.

results.description: Steve Coogan, an arrogant actor with low self-esteem and a complicated love life, is playing the eponymous role in an adaptation of “The Life and Opinions of Tristram Shandy, Gentleman” being filmed at a stately home. He constantly spars with actor Rob Brydon, who is playing Uncle Toby and believes his role to be of equal importance to Coogan’s.

results.title: 8½
results.brief_description: Guido Anselmi, a film director, finds himself creatively barren at the peak of his career. Urged by his doctors to rest, Anselmi heads for a luxurious resort, but a sorry group gathers—his producer, staff, actors, wife, mistress, and relatives—each one begging him to get on with the show. In retreat from their dependency, he fantasizes about past women and dreams of his childhood.
results.description: Guido Anselmi, a film director, finds himself creatively barren at the peak of his career. results.title: 42nd Street
results.brief_description: A producer puts on what may be his last Broadway show, and at the last moment a chorus girl has to replace the star.

constellations_other.name: Dancing on a dream
constellations_other.description: Mechanical lantern slides called chromotropes created wondrously complex patterns of light through sliding glass panels and internal gears.

results.description: A producer puts on what may be his last Broadway show, and at the last moment a chorus girl has to replace the star.
description_for_label: A producer puts on what may be his last Broadway show, and at the last moment a chorus girl has to replace the star.

results.title: 25th Hour
results.creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, 40 Acres & A Mule Filmworks, Julia Chasman, Sandra Hernandez, Tobey Maguire, Jon Kilik, Spike Lee, James Chinlund and David Benioff
results.brief_description: In New York City in the days following the events of 9/11, Monty Brogan is a convicted drug dealer about to start a seven year prison sentence, and his final hours of freedom are devoted to preparing his girlfriend for his extended absence.

constellations_other.name: Post-9/11
constellations_other.description: The attacks on the World Trader Center in New York City on September 11 2001 were viewed on live television by audiences around the world. The effects of the attack have been explored across various forms of media.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Touchstone Pictures, 40 Acres & A Mule Filmworks, Julia Chasman, Sandra Hernandez, Tobey Maguire, Jon Kilik, Spike Lee, James Chinlund and David Benioff
results.description: In New York City in the days following the events of 9/11, Monty Brogan is a convicted drug dealer about to start a seven-year prison sentence, and his final hours of freedom are devoted to hanging out with his closest buddies and trying to prepare his girlfriend for his extended absence.
description_for_label: In New York City in the days following the events of 9/11, Monty Brogan is a convicted drug dealer about to start a seven-year prison sentence, and his final hours of freedom are devoted to hanging out with his closest buddies and trying to prepare his girlfriend for his extended absence.

results.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1968
results.brief_description: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried beneath the lunar surface and sets off to find its origins with the help of HAL 9000, the world’s most advanced super computer, in Stanley Kubrick’s masterpiece, which pushed cinematic narratives and special effects.

constellations_other.name: Space, sci-fi and cinema fakes
constellations_other.description: Magic lantern slides were used to entertain and educate audiences in home, theatres and universities. While performers told jokes and fairytales, travelling showmen unveiled exotic locations and scientists revealed the latest discoveries.

constellations_other.name: Sounds unreal
constellations_other.description: A history of syncing sound effects, a craft known as Foley in the USA and bootstepping in the UK.

constellations_other.name: Future visions
constellations_other.description: Entities is a time-based data visualisation of visitors collecting objects and exploring Constellations. These actions are translated into graphical forms to show what’s being collected, as well as highlighting Constellations that share connections.

constellations_other.name: Kaleidoscopic colour: Chromotrope
constellations_other.description: A focus on distinctive and innovative examples of pattern, colour and movement.

constellations_other.name: Auteurs, influence and inspiration
constellations_other.description: A tradition of influence and inspiration beginning with Eisenstein.

constellations_other.name: The Kubrick connection
constellations_other.description: The visual effects for Blade Runner drew on a number of techniques from other iconic films, including two of Stanley Kubrick's masterpieces.

constellations_other.name: Evil AI, dystopias and production design
constellations_other.description: In No Code’s sci-fi thriller players take command of a multi-national space station’s artificial intelligence system to help the sole survivor solve the mystery of a missing crew and why the station is wildly off course.

constellations_other.name: Space, cinema and fakes
constellations_other.description: Before and after humans stepped foot on the moon, outer-space and the stars have inspired filmmakers, artists and game makers to imagine what's beyond our atmosphere.

results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1968
results.description: Humanity finds a mysterious object buried beneath the lunar surface and sets off to find its origins with the help of HAL 9000, the world’s most advanced super computer, in Stanley Kubrick’s masterpiece, which pushed cinematic narratives and special effects.

results.brief_description: A contemporary, ensemble drama telling the complex tale of six high school students whose lives are interwoven with situations that so many of today’s youth are faced with.
results.description: A contemporary, ensemble drama telling the complex tale of six high school students whose lives are interwoven with situations that so many of today’s youth are faced with. The story takes place during a normal school day. At precisely 2:37 a tragedy will occur, affecting the lives of a group of students and their teachers. As the story unfolds, the individual stories of the six teenagers are revealed, each with its own explosive significance. An unwanted pregnancy unravels a terrible, dark secret; all is not as it appears for the seemingly confident school football hero; an outcast must deal with everyday taunts from his peers; a beautiful young girl battles an eating disorder; a stellar student constantly struggles to win his parents’ approval; while another uses drugs to escape from his own demons.
description_for_label: A contemporary, ensemble drama telling the complex tale of six high school students whose lives are interwoven with situations that so many of today’s youth are faced with. results.title: 13th
results.brief_description: An in-depth look at the prison system in the United States and how it reveals the nation’s history of racial inequality.

constellations_other.name: The world's end
constellations_other.description: For people of colour oppressed by systemic racism, genre stories about the end of the world and cosmological monsters can be used to re-examine race and the injustices faced in real life.

constellations_other.name: Confronting injustice on-screen
constellations_other.description: The Black Lives Matter movement and the treatment of African Americans at the hands of authorities is explored in this Constellation that connects hip-hop, the Civil Rights Movement and representation in Hollywood.

results.description: An in-depth look at the prison system in the United States and how it reveals the nation’s history of racial inequality.
